biotools.summary:
Selecting optimal principal components for identifying clusters with highly imbalanced class sizes in single-cell RNA-seq data.

Principal Component Quantile Check.

Robustly Identifying the Most Important PC's for Clustering and Nonlinear Dimensionality Reduction.

Current best practices for performing clustering or non-linear dimensionality reduction methods like t-sne, highlight the importance of preprocessing the data with a dimensionality reduction technique, like Principal Component Analysis, as discussed in the SciKit-Learn Documentation.

The pcqc package was developed using,.
